properties.areaDesc: Interior Hancock; Coastal Hancock; Southern Piscataquis; Central Piscataquis; Central Washington; Central Penobscot; Coastal Washington; Southern Penobscot; Northern Washington
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 3:28AM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches
expected with locally higher amounts possible.

* WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Coastal DownEast, Far
Eastern, Interior DownEast and Penobscot Valley Maine.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 7 PM EST Thursday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The
hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening
commutes. Power outages are possible.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads
and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to
newengland511.org.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY
